'Action 3D' (titled 'Aasu Raja Rani Jackie Matrum Joker' in Tamil) is an
upcoming Indian 3D bilingual comedy film directed by Anil Sunkara. The film,
which will be made in Tamil and Telugu, features an ensemble cast of Allari
Naresh, Shaam, Vaibhav, Raju Sundaram, Kamna Jethmalani, Sneha Ullal and Neelam
Upadhyaya in the lead roles.
